summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements. A new Scripter component was created with a chat interface, added as a tab in the main application, and implements AI script generation functionality with loading states and code formatting. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Copy to clipboard functionality for generated code snippets
hallucinated_features.reason: The Scripter component includes a copy button with clipboard functionality (handleCopyCode function) that was not requested in any requirement or acceptance criteria

hallucinated_features.description: Clear history functionality with dedicated button
hallucinated_features.reason: The component includes a 'Clear History' button and clearHistory function that was not requested in the BuildRequest
Messages include timestamp formatting and display (formatTimestamp function) which was not specified in requirements
The component displays example prompts when no messages exist, which was not requested
